message: Let's start fair, Bob. I'm taking most of the money this time, but if you reject this, the deal gets worse for you with every round.
You're starting strong, but I'm not going down without a fight. Time to make a move!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  Let's get this done before the inflation eats away at our gains.
You're not getting it, Alice. I'm not going to let you take it all. Time to think smaller.
This is my final offer, Bob. I'm losing patience. If we don't agree now, we both stand to lose a lot more.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not afraid to take what's left.
